scripts.clean: cmd --% /c "(if exist dist rmdir /s /q dist) & (if exist build rmdir /s /q build) & (if exist .svelte-kit rmdir /s /q .svelte-kit) & (if exist .eslintcache del /f /q .eslintcache)" || rm -rf dist build .svelte-kit .eslintcache
scripts.build: cmd /c "(if exist svelte.config.js (npm run build:svelte) else (npm run build:ts))" || bash -c 'if [ -f svelte.config.js ]; then npm run build:svelte; else npm run build:ts; fi'
scripts.postbuild: npm run lint || echo "Lint failed. Continuing..."
scripts.start: cmd --% /c "(if exist svelte.config.js (npm run start:svelte) else (npm run start:ts))" || bash -c 'if [ -f svelte.config.js ]; then npm run start:svelte; else npm run start:ts; fi'
scripts.postpublish: cmd --% /c "for /f "delims=-" %a in ("%npm_package_version%") do if "%a" == "%npm_package_version%" npm dist-tag add "%npm_package_name%@%npm_package_version%" latest" || bash -c 'if [ "${npm_package_version#*-}" = "${npm_package_version}" ]; then npm dist-tag add "$npm_package_name@$npm_package_version" latest; fi'
